title: Laya, the Witch of Red Pooh, Volume 1
description: The tides of power turn ever slowly as Noodles and his band of fighters set their sights on reclaiming the Horai kingdoms. To do so, they must find six ancient battle relics in order to give their small army a fighting chance against the massive forces before them. But countering Noodles and company's moves is his twin brother Zetsos, who has set deadly assassins into action...
author: Yo Yo
